description: You can see now, but it doesn't make the place any less creepy. They say there is a creature here who is always listening, waiting in the dark. If it hears you speak, it will petrify you. Literally.

puzzles.description: Make Dash automatically search, turn on red lights, and stop.
puzzles.introduction: Dash is exploring the forest around Castle Creepenstein. What could possibly happen?

puzzles.description: After stopping, make Dash wait for 2.0 s then search again.

hints.description: Make a loop! Link the states with a Wait For cue set to 2.0 s.

puzzles.description: Make Dash use the listener to turn the lights off when a voice is heard. Then make Dash automatically say Oh no! and turn off all eye lights.
puzzles.introduction: The Listener state waits until a cue causes it to put Dash into a new state. Dash is afraid when red and will try to hide if you speak.

hints.description: Link the Listener to the Lights Off state with a Voice Heard cue. Link the sound and the Eye Ring with Auto cues.

puzzles.description: After turning off the eye lights, make Dash wait for 3.0 s then look around. Then make Dash automatically search again.
puzzles.introduction: When it's safe to come out of hiding, Dash will continue onward to the castle.

hints.description: Link the Eye Ring to the Look Around state with a Wait For cue set to 3.0 s. Link the Look Around state to the Search state using an Auto cue.
